name: Nintag
overview:
Nintag can be defined as Nigeria International Information gathering system. The search engine is built for people to find and get any information they need on Nigeria. Nintag allow those who seek for information, location or direction to any place within Nigeria to easily find it right from their laptop or mobile phone

BUILDING OF THE CONTENT AND THE DATA?. The web is filled with billions of information coming from various countries. Nintag is using a system called the web bot that is made only to collect data information pertaining to Nigeria by automatically crawling the World Wide Web. Also any business owners, celebrities and other people who want to be found can simply add there site name to our data base for free, doing that our spider bot will collect every web link pertaining to that particular site link. Also Business, Musician anyone can advertise on nintag to be seen on top of the list when people search from our site. Even local, small, medium and large scale business owners can utilize these tools to reach a wider audience

POSITIONING NIGERIA CONTENT AND BRANDS IN THE GLOBAL REGION. We are dedicated to Nigeria content local, national and international. Everyone knows where to find information on other country. Nintag will be the number one spot for anyone local, national or abroad to find information on Nigeria

CORRECTION OF INFORMATION IN CASE OF ANY CHANGES. Nintag web bot collect and update content automatically. If any changes are made on any site or content the web bot automatically update the information belonging to that content in our database immediately.
